casebody.data:
Meghan FLYNN, Gina Soscia, James Fishwick, Glenn Jacobs, Glenn Kasper and Alison L. Higgins, Petitioners
v.
SUNOCO PIPELINE L.P., Respondent No. 249 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. August 28, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW , this 28th day of August, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED .
